name: Aural Quest
overview: Promotional game given away free with 'Aural Sculpture' by The Stranglers. You are the Stranglers' Tour Manager. In the middle of decorating your flat you get a telephone call from CBS Records who want you to fly to five cities, Nice, New York, Stockholm, Tokyo and Brisbane, to collect the promoters' payments for the Stranglers Tour. You also have to find and bring back to London the four parts of a massive ear statue that the group use as part of their act. The payments must also be returned to London and taken to the accountant's office where you will get your next plane ticket.
